import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { email:string='' password:string='' login(){ //classin ullil no fn required if(!this.email || !this.password ){ alert() } } }
